name: Zombieland Fukuoka: 屍都福岡
description:
STORY

Zombie apocalypse broke out in Fukuoka City, Japan. The city central where suspected as the source of zombies has been locked down. You were sent there as a member of special forces investigating the source of zombies and annihilating them.

CONTROLS

After starting a game, press F1 to show the controls.

TIPS
  • Your default weapons are a knife and a sub-machinegun(MP5). Beware of out of ammo especially in the beginning.
  • Headshot and backstabbing can give zombies a huge damage.
  • As of now saving a game progress is unavailable. Proceed with caution!
  • Japanese being used in this game is dialect of Fukuoka, northern Kyushu. People those who learning standard Japanese may not understand at all.
